entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 30 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
